title: Futbol Americas: Wayne Rooney returns to MLS
description:
On Monday’s episode of Futbol Americas, Sebastian Salazar and Herculez Gomez discuss Wayne Rooney's return to DC United. Can the Englishman turn things around at D.C. United? The guys also debate who had a worst weekend after losing 3-0 at home, Seattle or Atlanta Utd? Next the guys recap all the Liga MX action from the weekend. Which 'big' team needs to hit the panic button?

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Sebastian Salazar and Herculez Gomez discuss Wayne Rooney's return to DC United as head coach
